textos_fuente.text: Mathers Social Gathering Florida's Largest Speakeasy | Rating 4.5 of 5 Search for: Home Secret Bars Contact Search for: Mathers Social Gathering Florida‚Äôs Largest Speakeasy by Hidden Libations | Nov 11, 2020 | Orlando Welcome to Mathers Social Gathering, Florida‚Äôs largest speakeasy. Even though this place is a very well-known secret, the size does not take away from its grandeur or exclusivity. With an elegant dress code and a double entrance, there‚Äôs still an elaborate experience to get in to this secret bar. Look for the Phoenix Building, locate the dapper doorman, whisper the password and see if he‚Äôll let you through. To actually enter Mathers, after approval at the door, you have to ride the elevator up to a secret library where you need to figure out which bookcase opens to let you into the bar. This was really fun considering a lot of the speakeasies we‚Äôve visited do not allow you to open the door yourself, it was a true exploration adventure. As the typical early birds, we were almost the only ones at the bar and were able to take pictures without masks before entering the seating area (Strict COVID rules for safety- unless a drink was to our mouth, masks were on). Behind the hidden bookcase entrance, the bar is spacious and gloriously renovated with a vintage gentlemen‚Äôs club vibe ‚Äì original wood floors, brick walls, and tufted leather couches. The building is over 130 years old and Mathers Social Gathering honors the history of the building by only updating what is necessary for modern comfort and restoring antique collectibles from the building‚Äôs past. A few grammable additions (such as a swinging velvet loveseat) show that they are staying trendy even within their vintage atmosphere. Mathers‚Äô mission is to provide a sophisticated yet comfortable space for people to gather together, and they do a great job of it. The drink menu is organized by liquor type and specially curated by the owners to promote spirit authenticity, as true speakeasies did in the past. Devin, one of the curators, was excited to share his favorite creation with us: the ‚ÄúEnvy‚Äù. The honey and ginger blended bourbon cocktail is served smoked with green apple and thyme. It is the level of sophistication sought for at such establishments, raising the bar for libations everywhere. We also enjoyed a ‚ÄúBathtub Gin,‚Äù served in a tiny bathtub, the gin emphasized with honey and lavender. And to top it all off we also ordered their refreshing and popular ‚ÄúStrawberry Fields‚Äù and the ‚ÄúBlueberry Basil Gimlet.‚Äù It was quite the tipsy party by the time we left! ‚Äã A few extra details I‚Äôd be remiss not to mention: they have an amazing happy hour. Tuesday through Saturday from 4pm ‚Äì 7pm craft cocktails are half price, unusual for the hidden bars we seek! The next time we visit will be around Christmas because Devin seriously talked up their elaborate holiday d√©cor, custom drinks, and themed entertainment. Live musicians play each weekend and Tuesdays feature burlesque. Lastly, Mathers will soon be expanding and opening locations in Tampa and Jacksonville. Mathers Social Gathering is a wonderful bar with all the right gimmicks of a speakeasy. The only thing that set this bar back for us is its size. It‚Äôs wonderful that they are so successful, but I hope to see their franchises scale down to create a more intimate atmosphere rather than a party space. That being said though, this is the perfect hidden bar to give people an introduction to speakeasies and the culture that surrounds finding and enjoying these elusive drinking dens. Waiting for travel to open back up so we can get out of Florida. Stay safe everyone. Your home-bound PLIs (Visited July 2020) Submit a Comment Cancel reply Your email address will not be published. Required fields are marked * Comment * Name * Email * Website Hidden Libations Rating Overall 4.5 of 5 Keys Secrecy 4 of 5 Keys Drinks 4.5 of 5 Keys Atmosphere 4 of 5 Keys Mathers Social Gathering Florida‚Äôs Largest Speakeasy Information About Mathers Social Gathering Florida‚Äôs Largest Speakeasy ÓÇÅ Address 30 , South Magnolia Avenue , Orlando , Florida , 32801 , United States ÓÅ´ Hours Mon: Closed Tue: Closed Wed: 7PM‚Äì12AM Thu: 7PM‚Äì12AM Fri: 7PM‚Äì2AM Sat: 7PM‚Äì2AM Sun: 12PM‚Äì12AM ÓÇÄ Visit Speakeasy Website https://www.mathersorlando.com The Woo Woo NYC The Woo Woo, located between Hells Kitchen and the largest tourist trap in the world, is a faux 1980s sex shop and a pure blast from the past! Read More 6 Speakeasies in Ireland You Need To Visit The Emerald Isle, a land known for its pubs and famous black beer! While we do enjoy a well pulled pint of Guinness, you know our true hearts desire lies in the depths of a well-hidden speakeasy flowing with luscious libations and a sultry atmosphere. Read More 5 London Speakeasies You Need To Visit Late April 2022 we had the chance to stopover London for two nights and tried to hit a number of Speakeasies to add to the map. Our first visit to London in 2017 was just before we started the blog and hadn‚Äôt taken good notes or pictures. Unfortunately, London has shamefully been ill represented by Hidden Libations. Read More Discount Suit Company (DSC) Located in a shop that looks like an abandoned suit store from the 90s, this long-time speakeasy still had a lovely local feel without the tourist hoopla that typically comes with age and maintained a regular subterranean basement living room atmosphere. A rather grungy drinking spot, the cocktails are nothing fancy but delicious, and chatting with the staff was the best part. DSC makes you feel relaxed, at home, and ready to return. We certainly wish we had a local bar like this near our home to frequent for the lovely community vibe. Read More Happiness Forgets Very small hidden neighborhood bar. This speakeasy was interesting to find because it felt right in the middle of a residential district. No theme to this place, just a nonchalant local drinking hole that‚Äôs not easy to see unless you know where to look. The drinks were very unique and very tasty; even better was their great selection of mocktails. Read More Murder Inc. Cocktails This bar was so quirky and fun! Definitely a unique theme we enjoyed and would recommend people visiting. The only caveat is that it didn‚Äôt feel like a speakeasy, but more just off the beaten path. The bar is found on a bendy alley off the main road, but it‚Äôs clearly marked and has lights pointing you downstairs. The drinks were more typical but good and it was a fun place overall. Small plates are served upon your request to complement your favorite cocktails. EVOLUTIONARY Mathers Social Gathering lives in a prominent Downtown Orlando building aged over 140 years. Mathers in its current state has taken the stylish dark wood, vast pillars and exposed brick and turned it into a historical social hideaway. House Rules Our establishment holds high standards. To ensure the enjoyment of all patrons, we‚Äôve established a dress code and house rules. House Rules Private Events Mathers has been the backdrop for weddings, photoshoots, work parties, and showers. Please see below for photoshoots/private event inquiries. Private Events Bottle Service We offer bottle service to enhance your time here with us. Click the button below to book our Family Table or Library Section for bottle service. Mathers Social Gathering | Orlando Venue | PartySlate Skip to content Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Mathers Social Gathering Find Venues / Florida / Orlando / Mathers Social Gathering Mathers Social Gathering 3 Phoenix Building, 30 S Magnolia Ave, Orlando, FL 32801, United States Max Seated 80 Max Standing 500 Request info Favorite Overview Gallery 0 About Mathers Social Gathering Mathers' prohibition-inspired hideout is the perfect setting for a smart intimate celebration. Within the boundaries of exposed brick walls, an intriguing library of hand-crafted libations, and tufted leather and velvet upholstery, celebrate the most important of occasions. Evenings are designed to meet your highest expectations, with themed entertainment and a delectable, tailored meal. With a classy yet appealing celebration, become a part of history in this 1800s establishment. Choose Mathers to make a lasting impression at your next social, corporate, or wedding-related event.

Classic and modern cocktails are created by our stylish bartenders using boutique spirits and seasonal fruit, as well as house-made cordials, bitters, and syrups. Small snacks are served to accompany your favorite beverages upon request.

Originally a late-nineteenth-century furniture business. The sophisticated, dark wood, exposed brick-filled hideaway has been transformed into a communal meeting space by Mather's.

After nearly 20 years of culinary experience in Downtown Orlando, Darren "Dan" Allinder now holds the keys to Mather's Social Gathering. Pastry and baking arts are his culinary emphasis and passion in fine dining places. Because of his expertise, Darren is uniquely qualified to serve some of the finest spirits and cocktails in the country. Event Spaces 1 80 max seated ‚Ä¢ 500 max standing 4 Indoor Space 80 Seated 150 Standing Event Space Pricing Packages Mathers Social Gathering hasn't listed their pricing yet. Connect with them directly to get a customized pricing proposal for your event.
